job.title: data scientist, People Analytics - Remote

predicting outcomes understanding complex data relationships and developing a quantitative return on investment This role works on the Inclusion amp Diversity IampD team managing Equal Employment Opportunity EEO affirmative action AA and compensation related analysis impacting inclusion and diversity efforts and partners with the broader IampD Analytics amp Insights and Human Resources teams to develop long term data analysis reporting infographics and dashboard solutions utilizing the latest in computing technologies and operating across customer transactions and data elements to unlock the opportunities to support our global business Models and acts in accordance with Starbucks guiding principlesbrbrstronguSummary Of Key ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliExtracts data from various initiatives and serves as primary analytic resource in discussions with business partners to define business questions liliDrives creation of final insights package and recommendations leads presentation liliDirects analytic component of implementation of insights into business processes and ensures appropriate testing takes place liliDevelops project proposals gains stakeholder buyin and ensures timelines are met liliPromotes and advocates value of advanced analytics to solve business problems within department liliMentors data analysts in descriptive and predictive analytics detection association rules etcliliExposure and businessapplicable experience in several data ETL Teradata Oracle SQL Python Java Ruby PigliliExposure and businessapplicable experience in several analytic languages R SAS SPSS Stata liliBig data processing techniques preferredliliRetail customer loyalty and eCommerce experience preferredbrliulStarbucks and its brands are an equal opportunity
